CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 27, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "Keeping Cool! - There's nothing like a dip in a cool pool...some relief from the effects of a steadily rising temperature, and that's what these folks were after during the picnic at North Park July 17, when the Phys. Ed. department of Pitt U. sponsored an interracial get-together. As the camera shows, kiddies and adults alike are having a grand and glorious splash! - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Woman wearing bathing cap, girl with two hair braids, and boy playing with sailboat in North Park pool for interracial picnic sponsored by the University of Pittsburgh Physical Education Department
CatSubject_tab: Children--Pennsylvania--Allegheny County.Women--Pennsylvania--Allegheny County.Swimming pools--Pennsylvania--Allegheny County.Allegheny County (Pa.).Department of Parks, Recreation, and Conservation.North Park.Bathing suits--Pennsylvania--Allegheny County.
